embed.description: i play Soraka a lot and i love the Marauder skins, so i thought i'd practice the style, and make a fan art :3 thank you to my friends for the great feedback and to Geoffrey for the help with the concept and support :) diffuse only Soraka 6,816 tris/1024x1024 Weapon 604 tris/512x512 i'll be sending this model and files out on Patreon for the month of April in a few days :) https://www.patreon.com/ybourykina

replies.body: \*-* This is absolutely stunning. This is an amazing alternative fantasy for Soraka. I love the design of the weapon, and I also love how it's kept a solid silhouette, as well as leaving some femininity to the character. Also, holy crap the color variants (!!!) I love the black white and red one. Nicely done! ^-^
Riot Pls make this. I love raka <3~
I would love, love, love if we made this a reality.

Damn thats a really well done skin!

If riot were to do this, would they need to pay this artist or could they just make their own version from scratch? Or perhaps riot could just employ this artist :P
Looks like making their own version would be a terrible waste of a nearly perfect piece of art. This is fantastic. Looks like part of the skin line already.

Right? But how would this artist get paid for the skin since they werent employed at the time of development? just wondering what riot would do in this situation

Anywho its nice to see alternate theme skins for supports, since most of them are all goodie twoshoes
the color variants for the skin could be her chroma pack

thank you so much for the support! <3

-Yekaterina/YBourykina :3
Hire this person immediately
too bad they already work at Blizz

nah i left at the end of last year :)

-Yekaterina/YBourykina <3
I think Marauder and Warden Skins are ugly in game imho. But this would be the best looking one. Good job dude.

Eh, I think Marauder Ali, Ashe, and Warwick all look great since the color scheme and design works well together, however I do believe that the Warden skin line is very lackluster and only Nautilus looks okay.
I think its because the actual skins in this line are very monotone.  This one has quite a bit of aesthetic variance with the red cloth, which i like a lot.
YEEEEESSSSS!!!!!!!{{sticker:slayer-pantheon-rainbows}}

If you haven't looked at the bottom of the pedestal....it is a must

I chortled
If Riot made this skin a reality, I would buy it.  Raka is life.
So amazing <3 ~ This is the kind of raka skin we need in our lives.
Nice unicorn picture you hid on the 3d viewer {{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}}
Simply amazing concept. Im not a big fan of Marauder series but this one is wonderful. Great work.

.......... Why couldn't we of had this instead of the Robot Soraka? Don't get me wrong, the latest Soraka skin doesn't look bad but I mean- check this skin out!! It's so amazing and makes her look hardcore man.

{{sticker:zombie-nunu-hearts}}
*have
At least include a funny Grammar Nazi meme in there ... ? Would of been nice.

Thematically, it doesn't fit because Marauders are supposted to be like Barbarians but as a skin it does fit.

Soraka's healing thing just doesn't look like she could be something so shallow.

> [{quoted}](name=LightTrack,realm=EUW,application-id=A8FQeEA8,discussion-id=aX3EkzfY,comment-id=000c,timestamp=2016-06-03T15:01:05.901+0000)
>
> Thematically, it doesn't fit because Marauders are supposted to be like Barbarians but as a skin it does fit.
> 
> Soraka's healing thing just doesn't look like she could be something so shallow.

The fact she has to damage other champs with her Star Call can put her somewhat in this category. When they reworked her, they ignored her lore and made her someone who had to harm and not strictly/support her team.

No i'm not talking about some off-meta bullshit, she's a healing Celestial caretaker. The fact that you can play her with damage has nothing to do with her own thematics. She's only played as a Support in every serious game anyway.
So is {{champion:12}}
Alistar is an angry bull whose lore is outdated. He is a lot closer to going crazy than someone that's basically an ethereal angel.
Love this design for Soraka.  Upvote so much.  Silver and Teal variant ftw : )
This is really neat! Kind of reminds me of Warden Karma.
Wow, this skin is amazing! I wish Riot would have made this, I would've paid good money to have this skin AND Chroma's. Too bad they wont take your Idea and use it for the greater good :(
Looks amazing
That's awesome!
RITO PLZ NOW.
How did you make this artwork?

3ds max for modeling, UVs, rigging/skinning, and posing, 3d coat and photoshop for textures, and marmoset for real-time shots :)

-Yekaterina/YBourykina
Why not make this into a custom skin?

I'M ALWAYS DOWN FOR FULL BODY ARMOR!

I mean, yeah, I guess that's cool. ~~I'm not a Marauder fan boy.~~
you havent seen reaper soraka then? also all skin concepts should be slight variations to crazy cat lady yorick
